body.description: The coolest coffee shop is right at home! The Mr. Coffee Single-Serve Iced and Hot Coffee Maker makes it easy to brew flavorful and refreshing iced coffee, or bold, pod-free hot coffee. When it comes to brewing coffee just the way you like it, the magic is in the measurements! This coffee machine’s easy-to-use measuring system and dual-sided scoop make brewing simple, and give you the perfect ratio of water and coffee and ice, for coffee that is always bold and flavorful—never watered down. To create iced coffee, the perfect concentration of hot coffee is brewed directly over ice. Want coffee in a hurry? No problem. The machine brews in under 4 minutes. Brew 6, 8, 12, or 16 oz. of bold, hot coffee and 22 oz. of refreshing iced coffee, with the single-serve reusable filter. Get all the taste, and avoid the waste. Brew directly into the reusable tumbler, or your favorite mug, and enjoy!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Mr. Coffee Single-Serve Iced and Hot Coffeemaker, Black

The Coolest Coffee Shop Is Right at Home Easily brew flavorful and refreshing iced coffee, or bold, pod-free hot coffee from the comfort of your kitchen. No long lines. No mixed up orders. The Mr. Coffee SingleServe Iced and Hot Coffee Maker lets you enjoy your favorite coffee drinks without having to leave your home. Brew Iced or Hot Coffee Just How You Like It in Under 4 Minutes Quickly and easily brew refreshing iced coffee or flavorful hot coffee exactly how you like it in less than 4 minutes. Key Features Brew iced or hot coffee in minutes Easy measuring system Pod-free brewing Reusable tumbler, lid, and straw Reusable filter Dual-sided scoop Recipe book included

Be Your Own Barista The Magic Is in the Measurements! The integrated measuring system makes it easy to brew the perfect ratio of water and coffee and ice, for coffee that is always bold and never watered down. Pod-Free Brew up to 16 oz. of bold, pod-free hot coffee with the single-serve reusable filter. Reusable Tumbler Includes a reusable tumbler, lid, and straw, so you can easily take your coffee on the go. All the Extras Comes with a reusable coffee filter, a dual-sided scoop, and a recipe book.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really really great coffee!
reviews.reviewText: The most important thing a coffee maker needs to do is brew great coffee. This machine is shockingly good in that regard! Took it out of the box, washed it up, and ran a couple cycles of water through it to flush it out. Ground some French roast at a medium-fine setting (25 on my Rancilio Rocky) put two scoops of coffee in, filled the water reservoir, and two minutes later I was enjoying a really great cup of coffee. I usually drink Aeropress, occasionally Chemex or V60 pour over. The coffee from this machine is roughly comparable to those in quality - different of course, but not markedly worse. It's certainly far better coffee than my full-size Cuisenart drip coffee maker can produce.Only two criticisms really. I ordered a black unit and I received a blue coffee maker with a faux marble base. Since it's going to the office that's not such a big deal, but if I was buying it for my kitchen I'd return it for a replacement. Also, it would be nice if there was a stand to hold shorter mugs a few inches higher and avoid splashing. This coffee maker is really designed for tall mugs or tumblers.Ergonomics and thoughtful design touches: Scoop holder in the side of the unit is very convenient. Water reservoir capacity markings make it easy to fill straight from the Brita once you know much your mug holds. The lid folds well out of the way making it easy to fill with coffee and water. Everything is super easy to clean.Coffee brewing: Fast! Heats quickly and gets straight to brewing. Depending on grind, the brew cycle will take 2-3 minutes which is just about optimal. The water temperature is just under boiling and is spot on for making a well-extracted cup of coffee. The reusable filter is great and replacements are readily available.If you want to ditch the pods and easily brew single servings of great drip coffee this is the way.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Coffee maker is great! The tumbler sucks though
reviews.reviewText: Let's start with the negative because it isn't ALL that bad. Really, my grievances are with the tumbler provided. For starters, it is not dishwasher safe so that is automatically an issue for me. With three people in the house doing dishes, I am forced to wash it immediately for fear that someone else is going to put the cup in the dishwasher. It also leaks really badly. The seal on the lid is terrible. You can't tilt the cup at all unless you want a shift full of coffee.Onto the good. This is the best 30 coffee maker I have ever bought! It is simple to use. It brews quickly and everything is really easy to clean. I like how small it is because it doesn't take up a lot of space on the counter. That means I can have both my full-pot coffee maker out for the weekends one when I want to lounge with a pot and this one out at the same time! It just tucks into the corner. The brews are the same strength whether they brew hot or cold. I personally feel the scoop suggestions are too big but that probably depends on the coffee you are using. I use the smaller scoop for my coffee because I use a really dark french roast. That seems to work perfectly for me. I would suggest you try the big scoop as instructions call for the first time, but experiment with your coffee. The big scoop is about what I use to brew a whole pot in my other maker. Pro tip number 2! Prep your coffee ahead. Load the water, load the beans, then put your tumbler (a better one that is dishwasher safe) in the freezer with ice and a little honey syrup. Then all you have to do in the morning is hit brew!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars works great for single cup of coffee
reviews.reviewText: Happy with the product but the water reservoir is slightly small for full cup of coffee . So after it's started to run coffee into cup - I add a 1/4 cup more water to reservoir to get a full 16 oz cup of coffee.Fast and easy and makes good coffee and Ice coffee.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A good easy to use single serve unit with one big flaw
reviews.reviewText: It is so hard to find a single serve unit that does not use pods or pod cup adapters that are fussy to use or is difficult to feed the water AND also brews a good cup...this unit has all the marks of being THE ONE... except...the flat grounds basket filter is insufficient to concentrate the grounds and the water to get a good brewing. If you use the small scoop they provide, the grounds will dissipate from the center where the water drips and give a poor brewing effort. Our Hamilton Beach dual brew does a better job at single serve due to the somewhat conical grounds basket.Am sure if you put enough grounds in this flat basket, you might get ok results but at a high cost.After much research, we found a great solution, a pour-over conical filter that fits just right and gives a great rich brew w just two teaspoons of grounds.We got our pour-over filter from Walmart but is identical to this one at Amazon: ANNMEXX Upgraded Pour Over Coffee Filter, Coffee Dripper, Paperless Mess Stainless Steel Coffee Filter,... US$799the Walmart one is:Yafex Stainless Steel Mesh Pour Over Cone Coffee Dripper Filter Tea Strainer Funnel (size S)This fits perfect in the Main plastic basket (excl flat filter basket)If MR Coffee would improve their filter basket, this would be unnecessary, but the pour-over filter is excellent and we find almost no fine residue left in our cups. One note of caution, folks have reviewed this style filter complaining they wont even pass water- you need to wash them w warm soapy water first to remove the fine machine oils, Also the small holes on the very bottom on ours would not allow the last amount of water to pass, but I used a toothpick to gently push in to the filter from underneath to make some space under the bottom filter section and this works just fine now. Seems like a lot of effort but I am impressed w the filter now and the coffee maker is worthwhile with it.
Buen producto , es rápido y práctico , para una taza de café caliente , aún no pruebo hacer café frío ! En mi caso no traía popote!

Wanted a coffee maker with a smaller footprint on counter. Perfect for one person, regular cup or mug, or iced coffee or tea, or just hot water! Best coffee maker I ever had and I’ve had many! Thank you.

reviews.reviewTitle: Muy buena si te gusta el café en las rocas
reviews.reviewText: Muy bonita y fácil de usar.El café con hielo sí queda rico si lo haces con la medida que trae la misma cafetera.La recomiendo mucho por el precio.
Soy la única que toma café en casa, y esto me salvo por la porción perfecta: frío y caliente más feliz
